text:
Doubt that Osborne & his business pals are going to be so eager to be seen in press this week... #HSBC #bbcdp
http://t.co/hSlYPq1jXK
Crime writer lady and bald gent with glasses are talking my lingo #bbcqt. The less party politics on the show the better.
EU can work but needs reform. If we can't get a deal, we'll get out. Only way to get a vote is by having Cameron. #BattleForNumber10
the NHS doesn't need promises it needs an action plan. Every election we are told it's safe but its not. It should be non political #GE2015
With even a Tory talking about 13,000 more NHS patients immigration wasn't brought up. That's because immigration is non-issue here. #bbcqt
92% Of Swiss Voters Reject Carbon Tax In Referendum. Direct Democracy at work. http://t.co/MQ2eVZhxbK @UKIP  for #Brexit from #EU #GE2015
BBC News - Mental health service budgets 'cut by 8%' http://t.co/dhhrzX7TVk <Norman Lamb, where are you? #bbcdp >
UKIP blames the immigration problem on the EU. Most immigrants come from outside the EU. UKIP want more of them. #BBCQT
